headline: Coterra Energy Inc. (CTRA) Bolsters Accounting Team with Gregory F. Conaway
summary: Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE:CTRA) is one of the best buy-the-dip stocks to buy, according to analysts. On September 22, the company confirmed the appointment of Gregory F. Conaway as Vice President and Chief Accounting Officer. He takes over with in-depth accounting experience and holds a Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting and a Master of […]
